name: QUO - Within The Backrooms
description:
Hey, we are islaOliva Games a two-person indie video game development studio based in Tenerife, Canary Islands (Spain). Check out our games.

FOLLOW US

Twitter @islaOlivaGames
Instagram @islaOlivaGames
Our games at Steam
YouTube islaOliva Games

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM

OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later

Processor: Intel G4560/Athlon 200GE or better

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: GT 1030/RX 460 or better

Storage: 2 GB available space

Additional Notes: Target for 1080p, High Settings, 60 fps

RECOMMENDED

OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later

Processor: Intel i5 8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600

Memory: 6 GB RAM

Graphics: GTX 1060/RX 580 or better

Storage: 2 GB available space

Additional Notes: Target for 4k, High Settings, 60 fps
